Package com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares

Class Space

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares.Space
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISquare
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bushes, Lava, Mountain, Mud, Treasure, Trees, Wall, Water
public class Space extends Object implements ISquare
An open square which costs only one step to traverse. Superclass for all "squares" on a board. The game engine uses these objects to manage the game. The game engine will provide copies of these objects for you by your player to interact with the board.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Used by the game engine to change the color of the space based on the number of times your player has moved to the space. Students will not use this method. Use getStepCount() instead.
      Returns:
      Color of the (empty) space.

    • getStepCount

      public int getStepCount()
      Description copied from interface: ISquare
      The number of times your player has moved to this space. Sometimes it will be necessary to move to a space more than once as different paths to treasure might overlap.
      Specified by:
      getStepCount in interface ISquare
      Returns:
      The number of times the player has moved to this space.
